Zodiac Monsters
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS 2: FAQ (basic essentials, read this first!): Zodiac Monsters
By Thorr on Tuesday, September 2, 2008 - 07:10 am:

After beating The Big Bang Colosseum tournament, you will qualify for the Zodiac Monsters. These monsters are special breeds that you first must encounter with an event. These events occur in various places and there is one event each month.

MonthPlaceMonsterCodeNotes
1Papass MountainsZ (Durahan/?) CodeFind the Builder in the upper right area of the map. Afterwards, go a little further north to find a Durahan. Defeat him for the code.
2Volco LavaBlue Phoenix (Phoenix/?) CodeFind Cammy around the first bend. Follow the road further until you reach the place where you helped the first phoenix. Fight the Phoenix there for the code. WARNING - This Phoenix has 1500 life!!!
3PromiassUltimate (Gali/?) CodeFind Ron at the event crystal up the first north hallway. Then head Right to the middle of the three possible hallways. Meet up with the Gali. Fight him for the code.
4JungleSonna Banana (Naga/?) CodeFind Cammy at a crystal immediately south of the pond. Break through the log in the southeast corner and find the Naga in that loop. Fight him for the code.
5PromiassCaesar (Xenon/?) CodeFind Crysta at the mouth of the hallway where you got the King's Crest (In the central area). Head toward the same room as the King's Crest. At the entrance, the Xenon will appear. Fight him for the code.
6Angowass RoadBeretta (Joker/?) CodeFind Amino and his assitant just off the road between the two bridges. Head up the river (but not across the second bridge) to encounter the Joker. Fight him for the code.
7JungleKiller General (Zan/?) CodeFind Colt at an event crystal in the upper left area. After, you will get another event crystal nearby where you encounter the Zan. Defeat the Zan and you will be given the code to generate the Killer General.
8BeachEggplantern (Beaklon/?) CodeFind Tora at an event crystal in the area to right of the top of the map. After finding him, head directly to the right toward the plaque. You will encounter a Beaklon. Defeat him to get the code.
9Volco LavaVega (Dragon/?) CodeFind Ron at Event Crystal in second ring above center. Go all the way to the center to find the Dragon. Defeat it to get the code.
10Papass MountainsKenjirou (Cantaur/?) CodeFind the Centaur between the point of the L crack and the center butte. He looks like Kentaro, but is a different monster. Defeat him for the code.
11Angowass RoadAkashic (Monol/?) CodeFind the event crystal just above the road between the 2 bridges. Fight the Monol the get the code.
12FarmProto Zero (Henger/?) CodeGo to the gate of your farm. Roroi will show up at an event crystal where the road begins. After talking to him, continue up to the very end where the gate is. Fight the Henger there.
